sentences.en: Eg : Dr. Morrow's Merceds had a distinctive pattern on its leather upholstery.
sentences.cn: 莫罗博士奔驰车的皮垫上有块特别的图案.

sentences.en: Example : The cat really did a job on the upholstery.
sentences.cn: 猫把室内的装潢毁的够呛的.

sentences.en: I did notice someone scrubbing out spots on the upholstery.
sentences.cn: 我确实注意到有人擦掉室内装潢品上的污点.

sentences.en: In upholstery application especially in automobiles and aircraft, low fogging is required.
sentences.cn: 低雾化性是生产家具革,特别是汽车、飞机等座垫用革的特殊要求.

sentences.en: Scarlett burrowed her head in the dusty upholstery and screamed again.
sentences.cn: 思嘉趴在满是尘土的软垫上,又大喊起来.

sentences.en: Silk , Silk Fabric, Curtains, Jacquard , Dhobby, Chenille Curtains and Upholstery EmbroiderySilk.
sentences.cn: 采购产品丝, 丝织物,帐, 提花机, 绳绒线帐和室内装潢品.

sentences.en: Simon rested his head against the upholstery.
Some SLXI Models featured air conditioning and velour upholstery.
sentences.cn: 有些SLXI模型功能空调和天鹅绒装饰.

sentences.en: Tenterhooks are the upholstery of the anxious seat.
sentences.cn: 歪曲事实是内心惶恐的一种掩饰.

sentences.en: The car is available with black or red trim , ie upholstery, etc.
sentences.cn: 这种汽车的装修(即坐具等)有黑色的也有红色的.

sentences.en: The cavernous interior, enveloped in leather upholstery, was also black.
sentences.cn: 宽敞的车内空间也是黑色的, 包裹着皮饰.

sentences.en: The dominant element of the interior is the Scout - specific upholstery.
sentences.cn: 内政部的主导因素是童军特定的装饰.

sentences.en: The overstuffed leather seat and soft velour upholstery are all brand new.
sentences.cn: 那又软又厚的皮革制座椅及其丝绒软垫都是新的.

sentences.en: The research content is the pattern design of upholstery fabrics.
sentences.cn: 研究内容是家用纺织品图案设计.

sentences.en: You'll receive samples of paint, curtains and upholstery.
sentences.cn: 你将收到涂料、窗帘、家具垫衬套的样品。

words.tran_cn: 装饰；用（挂毯、家具等）布置；为（沙发等）装上垫子

trans.tran_cn: 家具装饰业，室内装饰品
